In-Person learning has been suspended for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.
The Two Rivers YMCA will be offering School's Out Club at their Moline campus during the closing of the Illinois K-12 schools this month.

div.p: The entire East Moline District #37 community will prepare all students to become life-long learners who are productive, responsible members of a global community.

p.strong:
A safe and nurturing environment
Collaborative, fact-driven decision making
Equitable learning opportunities for all students
High expectations for all stakeholders
A strong, community-wide support network
